clause_text: The story is set in 1949
starting with college
The narrator and three others became friends in college
They were acquainted in high school as athletes at different schools
They enrolled in the same college after graduation
The story is set in 1949
starting with college
The narrator and three others became friends in college
They were acquainted in high school as athletes at different schools
They enrolled in the same college after graduation
The narrator was from a farm
while the others lived in the city
The friends would visit the farm to hunt and help with chores
They hunted rabbits and squirrels together
